item.description:
NEW STUFF:
I forgot the movie's link! Oops! (500) Days of Summer. There you go!

The movie starts at 7:40, so let's meet outside the theater BY 7:10. I wait for people for less time on the weekends, seeing as how it's more crowded. So I'll be heading in to buy tickets AT 7:20 sharp. Please keep your RSVP up-to-date and call me with any "I'm lost"s or "I'm late"s!

Hope to see you tomorrow!

--Dana
508/308-4897

OLD STUFF:
This romantic comedy looks cute (well, we've done all the action movies so far!). (500) Days of Summer stars Joseph Gordon-Levitt (of "3rd Rock from the Sun" fame) and upcoming -- and currently omnipresent -- star Zooey Deschanel (you may have seen her in Yes Man or Almost Famous).

SUMMARY:
This is a story of boy meets girl, begins the wry, probing narrator of 500 DAYS OF SUMMER, and with that the film takes off at breakneck speed into a funny, true to life and unique dissection of the unruly and unpredictable year-and-a-half of one young man's no-holds-barred love affair.

THE USUAL STUFF:
We'll meet outside the theater doors and then I can buy us all discounted tickets ($8.00 each for FMM members and their guests). I also have $3 vouchers each for small sodas and small popcorns (can be used towards a larger size). Exact change makes me like you more.

As always, guests are welcome, just be sure to include them in the RSVP so that I know who/how many to expect.

Please keep your RSVP as up-to-date as possible. And please call me if you're going to be late or need to change your RSVP after I close RSVPs on the site (2 hours before we meet). My cell is: 508/308-4897. I'm also good for directions if you get lost.

After the movie, we'll head to Fridays (I'll bring the coupons!) to chat about the movie (and just chat).

I'll update this meetup with a specific time a few days before, so keep an eye on your email!

Hope to see you for 500 Days of Summer!

--Dana
item.name: (500) Days of Summer
